1.title: Ascending Anticipation

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: In pursuit of passion and adventure, Russ Garcia prepares to make the leap of faith and leave his hometown friends, and family behind.

2.title: First Impressions

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: There are few moments in life when we realize we will be headed down a different path. Explore the culture, art, and city of Lima, Peru in this first step of the great journey.

3.title: Oasis

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Russ Garcia takes the road to explore historical, and cultural sites outside the capitol city. Follow the journey through the diverse streets of Pisco, Huaccachina, and Nazca, Peru.

5.title: In the Forest of Rain

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Venturing outside the city population, Russ Garcia takes us on a jungle safari excursion to visit the Amazon Rainforest. Flourishing with unfamiliar sounds and wild animals, get an all encompassing view of life in the Amazon Rainforest.

6.title: City of the Inca

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Experience the 26 mile journey on the Inca Trail, through the Sacred Valley, up "dead Woman's Pass" and culminating at the arrival of "The Lost City of the Inca" - Machu Picchu, a world renowned historical site.

7.title: Moving South

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: Off the beaten path, Russ Garcia takes us on a journey through Lake Titicaca, into the altiplano and the world's largest salt flats.

8.title: A Journey of Three Thousand Miles

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Continuing the adventure through the Atacama Desert, we follow Russ down the Chilean coast line exploring the surf and wine culture of this rich environment.

9.title: The End Is Only the Beginning

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Ending the adventure, Russ finds his home in central Chile after his final stops in Valparaiso and Viña Del Mar. Excited for his life ahead of him, Russ will integrate himself into the Chile culture working, and living out of Santiago, Chile.

10.title: Looking Back

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: Russ Garcia sets out on an incredible adventure, leaving his home in pursuit of his passion. In this right to passage, he will soon discover his possibilities can exceed beyond the coasts of his home land, one small interaction at a time. Join the celebration of life and the human condition as we embark down South America.

-1.title: Peruvian Passion

episode of.title: The World on My Back (TV Series 2012– )

-1.plot: Russ Garcia takes the road to explore historical, cultural, and political encounters outside the capitol city. Follow the journey through the diverse streets of Huaccachina, Nazca, and Arequipa, Peru.

imdb.plot outline: Documenting the adventure of one individual and his right to passage, we navigate through the diverse cultures of South America; indulging in every experience a common explorer could possibly stumble upon. Discovering the rich heritage and traditions of many generations, we follow Russ Garcia on this "Gorilla- Style" documentary. Upholding the integrity of the production, we used minimal equipment and personnel in order to mimic how any average traveler would traverse through these interesting worlds of uncertainty.
imdb.title: The World on My Back
plot: Documenting the adventure of one individual and his right to passage, we navigate through the diverse cultures of South America; indulging in every experience a common explorer could possibly stumble upon. Discovering the rich heritage and traditions of many generations, we follow Russ Garcia on this "Gorilla- Style" documentary. Upholding the integrity of the production, we used minimal equipment and personnel in order to mimic how any average traveler would traverse through these interesting worlds of uncertainty.::Darren Fitch
